columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: PA_REVASCULARIZED_C_NAME
columns.description: Was pancreas revascularized before or after other organ if simultaneously transplanted with another organ

columns.name: PA_SURG_INC_C_NAME
columns.description: Specify the transplant surgical incision location.

columns.name: PA_GRAFT_PLACE_C_NAME
columns.description: Pancreas transplant graft placement

columns.name: PA_OP_TECH_C_NAME
columns.description: Pancreas transplant operative technique

columns.name: PA_DUCT_MANAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: Pancreas transplant duct management

columns.name: PA_DUCT_OTHER
columns.description: Pancreas transplant duct management. Used when "other" is specified for Pancreas Duct Management (I ORG 2004).

columns.name: PA_VENOUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Pancreas transplant venous vascular management

columns.name: PA_ARTERIAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the transplant arterial reconstruction method.
entries: Insertion of a donor iliac artery graft
Supraceliac aortic anastomosis to portion of donor thoracic aorta

columns.name: PA_ARTERIAL_OTHER
columns.description: Pancreas transplant arterial reconstruction method. Used when "other" is specified for Arterial Reconstruction (I ORG 2007).

columns.name: PA_VENOUS_GRAFT_YN
columns.description: Pancreas transplant venous extension graft

columns.name: SURGICAL_PROC_C_NAME
columns.description: Organ transplant surgical procedure

columns.name: SPLIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Organ transplant surgical split type
entries: Split Liver Left On the Bench
Split Liver Right on the Bench
Split Liver Right Triseg In Situ
Split Liver Right Triseg on the Bench
Split Liver Lateral Segment In Situ
Split Liver Lateral Segment on the Bench
Split Liver Right Not Indicated In Situ
Split Liver Right Not Indicated on the Bench

columns.name: VENOUS_DRAIN_C_NAME
columns.description: Intestine transplant venous drainage

columns.name: VISCERA_DRAIN_C_NAME
columns.description: Intestine transplant native viscera

columns.name: ANASTAMOSIS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Liver anastomosis type

columns.name: BACK_TABLE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of back table used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: PRESERV_SOLUTN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the organ preservation solution used during transplant.

columns.name: EST_BLOOD_LOSS
columns.description: Indicates the estimated blood loss (EBL) for the organ recipient in milliliters.

columns.name: ARTRY_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the artery site used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: BIL_DRAIN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the biliary drainage site used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: URETER_STENT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a ureteral stent was used during transplant.

columns.name: EXCRN_DRAIN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the exocrine drainage method used during transplant.

columns.name: VENO_VENOUS_BYPS_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the Veno-Venous Bypass (VVBP) technique was used during transplant.

columns.name: VENOUS_OUTFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the venous outflow technique used during transplant.

columns.name: PV_INFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the portal vein inflow technique used during transplant.
entries: Systemic Inflow from a Left Renal Vein Graft

columns.name: ARTRY_INFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the arterial inflow technique used for the organ recipient.
entries: Donor Iliac Jump Graft from the Aorta

columns.name: ARTRY_ANATOMY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the artery anatomy technique used for the organ recipient.
entries: Replaced Left Hepatic from Left Gastric
Replaced Left Hepatic and Right Hepatic

columns.name: DRAIN_NUM
columns.description: Indicates the number of drains used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: BIL_DCT_STNT_TY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the bile duct stent technique used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: PA_IMPLANT_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the pancreas implant site for the organ recipient.

columns.name: PORT_VEIN_PTNCY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the portal vein patency during transplant.

columns.name: VEIN_TREATMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the vein treatment used during transplant.

columns.name: ALT_INFLOW_TYPE
columns.description: Indicates the alternative inflow type used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: DNR_ARTRY_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the artery site of the donor organ.
entries: Carrel patch of aorta including both the celiac and SMA orifices

columns.name: DNR_VENOUS_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the venous site used for the donor organ.

columns.name: DNR_BIL_DRN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the biliary drainage site used for the donor organ.

columns.name: DNR_ARTRY_RECNST_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the artery reconstruction technique used for the donor organ.
entries: Celiac and SMA Carrel Patches Sewn Together
SMA Segment Containing the Replaced Right Hepatic to Celiac Trunk

columns.name: DNR_ARTRY_ANTMY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the arterial anatomy type used for the donor organ.

columns.name: DNR_ARTRY_INFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the arterial inflow technique used for the donor organ.

columns.name: ORG_SPLIT_METHD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the split method performed during transplant.

columns.name: BIL_ANASTOMOS_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the biliary anastomosis type.

columns.name: LVR_ANATOMY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the liver anatomy type for the organ recipient.
entries: Right Lobe w/o Middle Hepatic Vein
Right Lobe w/ Middle Hepatic Vein

columns.name: ARTRY_ANATOMY_OTH
columns.description: Indicates the specific arterial anatomy type used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: DNR_ARTRY_ANTMY_OTH
columns.description: Free text description of the specific arterial anatomy type used for the donor organ.

columns.name: KI_IMPLANT_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the kidney implant site for the organ recipient.

columns.name: VENOUS_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the venous site used for the organ recipient.

columns.name: URETER_RECNSTRCT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the ureteral reconstruction technique used during transplant.

columns.name: ASCITES
columns.description: Indicates the amount of ascites for the organ recipient in milliliters.

columns.name: PRESERV_SOLUTN_OTH
columns.description: Free text description of the specific organ preservation solution used during transplant.

columns.name: ARTRY_RECONSTRCT_SP
columns.description: Specifies the arterial reconstruction method for the donor's organ.

columns.name: URINE_PRODUCTION_YN
columns.description: Was there urine production in the operating room?

columns.name: BILE_PRODUCTION_YN
columns.description: Was there bile production in the operating room?

columns.name: LI_ARTERIAL_GX_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if an arterial graft was performed.

columns.name: LI_PORTAL_GX_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if a portal vein graft was performed.

columns.name: REPERFUSION_C_NAME
columns.description: The quality of reperfusion.

columns.name: END_OP_QUALITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The quality of the graft at the end of the operation.

columns.name: GRAFT_QUALITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The quality of the graft.

columns.name: DOMINO_DONOR_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this was a domino donor surgery.

columns.name: ORGAN_IN_OPFLD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the organ was removed from ice or pump, whichever was later, in Standard Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

columns.name: OGN_INROOM_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the organ was in the operating room.

columns.name: DNR_CONV_LAPA_OPN_YN
columns.description: Indicates if the laparoscopic procedure was converted to an open procedure.

columns.name: DNR_KI_PROC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The intended procedure type for the kidney donor.

columns.name: DNR_ARTERY_LEN_CM
columns.description: Indicates the arterial length of donor organ in centimeters.

columns.name: DNR_VENOUS_LEN_CM
columns.description: Indicates the venous length of donor organ in centimeters.

columns.name: DNR_URETERAL_LEN_CM
columns.description: Indicates the ureteral length of donor organ in centimeters.

columns.name: DNR_EBL_ML
columns.description: Indicates the donor's estimated blood loss in milliliters.

columns.name: DNR_KI_VENOUS_ANATOMY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the donor's venous anatomy during transplant.

columns.name: DNR_URETER_ANATOMY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the donor's ureteral anatomy during transplant.

columns.name: DNR_KI_FL_STRT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Time at which organ flushing began.

columns.name: DNR_KI_FL_END_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Time at which organ flushing ended.

columns.name: DNR_KI_DEPRT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Time at which the organ was removed from the operating room.

columns.name: DNR_LAP_TO_OP_REA_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason that the procedure was converted to open from laparoscopic.

columns.name: DNR_LAP_TO_OP_REA_O
columns.description: Stores the reason why the donor nephrectomy was converted from laparoscopic to open if the selected reason is "Other".

columns.name: CNSL_STRT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Time when the surgeon started using the console.

columns.name: CNSL_END_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Time at which the surgeon stopped using the console.

columns.name: TRANSECTION_STRT_TM_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the transection of a donor liver begins.

columns.name: TRANSECTION_END_TM_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the transection of a donor liver ends.

columns.name: ARTERIES_TO_LOBE
columns.description: The number of arteries connected to the liver lobe being transplanted.

columns.name: MID_HEP_VEN_INC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the middle hepatic vein is included in the lobe of liver being transplanted.

columns.name: NUM_BILE_DUCTS
columns.description: The number of bile ducts in the lobe of the liver being transplanted.

columns.name: PORTAL_VEIN_FLUSH
columns.description: Stores the quantity of fluid (in CCs) used to flush the portal vein.

columns.name: ARTERY_FLUSH
columns.description: Stores the quantity of fluid (in CCs) used to flush the artery.

columns.name: HEP_VEN_ANAT_OTH
columns.description: The anatomy of the hepatic vein in the part of the liver being transplanted (used when 'other' is selected for hepatic venous anatomy).

columns.name: BILE_DUCT_COM
columns.description: Comments about the bile ducts in the liver being transplanted.

columns.name: HEPATIC_VEN_ANAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The anatomy of the hepatic vein in the part of the liver being transplanted.
entries: Right Hepatic Vein Including All Segments
Right Hepatic Vein with Separate Segment 8
Right Hepatic Vein with Separate Segments 5,8
Right Hepatic Vein with Separate Segment 6
Single Orifice for Segments 2,3 with Separate Orifice for 4
Single Orifice for Segments 3,4 with Separate Orifice for 2
Right Hepatic Vein with Separate Segment 5

columns.name: PORT_VN_FLSH_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the organ was flushed prior to the transplant surgery.

columns.name: PORT_VN_FLSH_TEMP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the portal vein flush temperature during organ preparation prior to the transplant surgery.

columns.name: BACK_TBL_FLSH_OTHR
columns.description: Indicates the specific back table flush solution used during organ preparation prior to transplant surgery.

columns.name: RECPNT_VCC_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the vena cava cross clamp time for the transplant recipient.

columns.name: DNR_ARTERIAL_DIA_CM
columns.description: Indicates the arterial diameter of the donor organ in centimeters.

columns.name: DNR_ARTERIAL_DIS_CM
columns.description: Indicates the arterial distance apart of the donor organ in centimeters.

columns.name: DNR_VENOUS_DIA_CM
columns.description: Indicates the venous diameter of the donor organ in centimeters.

columns.name: DNR_VENOUS_DIS_CM
columns.description: Indicates the venous distance apart of the donor organ in centimeters.

columns.name: VOL_PRESER_SOL_ML
columns.description: Indicates the volume in milliliters of the organ preservation solution used during the transplant surgery.
